title:
Reconstruction of log-correlated fields from multiplicative chaos
  measures
abstract:
We consider log-correlated random fields $X$ and the associated
multiplicative chaos measures $\mu_{\gamma,X}$. Our results reconstruct the
underlying field $X$ from the multiplicative chaos measure $\nu_{\gamma,X}$.
The new feature of our results is that we allow the dimension $d$ to be
arbitrary and cover also the critical case $\gamma=\sqrt{2d}$. In the
sub-critical regime $\gamma<\sqrt{2d}$, we allow the fields to be mildly
non-Gaussian, that is, the field has the decomposition $X=G+H$ with a
log-correlated Gaussian field $G$ and a H\"older-continuos (not necessarily
Gaussian) field $H$.
